aboutMe: I love solving challenging problems in elegant ways. My primary focus is in full stack software development, UX and design. I am excellent at collaboration, team-work and clear communication. I am a life-long learner, who is constantly engaging in the latest web technologies and techniques.
In my freetime I ride my bike, play competitive first person video games with friends,  like CounterStrike:Global Offensive and spend time with my family.
